Package org.apache.shardingsphere.transaction.spi

Interface ShardingSphereTransactionManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, TypedSPI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SeataATShardingSphereTransactionManager, XAShardingSphereTransactionManager
    public interface ShardingSphereTransactionManager
extends TypedSPI, AutoCloseable
    ShardingSphere transaction manager.
